item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心回升但关税影响前景
item.description: 尽管需求预期跌至一年多以来的低点，而且建筑材料价格因关税提高而攀升，但本月美国住宅建筑商的信心因当前销售回升而勉强上升。【原文：US homebuilder confidence barely rose this month on a pickup in current sales, though demand expectations stumbled to a more than one-year low and prices of construction materials are climbing on the heels of higher tariffs.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率维持在 2.75%，寻求关税问题的进一步澄清
item.description: 加拿大央行暂停了降息周期，并重申决策者在等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策如何成形时 "将谨慎行事"。【原文：The Bank of Canada paused its interest rate cutting cycle and reiterated that policymakers “will proceed carefully” as they wait to see how US President Donald Trump’s trade policy takes shape.】

item.title: 加拿大银行预计全面贸易战将导致长达一年的经济衰退
item.description: 加拿大央行试图预测全球关税战的结果，这是两个经济体的故事：加拿大经济活动的暂时停滞或持续一年的彻底衰退。【原文：It’s a tale of two economies for the Bank of Canada as it tries to predict outcomes of a global tariff war: a temporary stall in Canadian activity or an outright downturn that lasts a year.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"的石油配额补偿努力仍显脆弱
item.description: 在欧佩克+再次推动成员国为破坏石油配额而赎罪之际，最新数据显示，它们在这方面的记录一如既往地糟糕。【原文：As OPEC+ makes yet another push for members to atone for busting their oil quotas, the latest data show their record of doing so is as bad as ever.】

item.title: 动荡打破高等级债券销售计划，零交易日激增
item.description: 预计今年美国公司将再出售近 1 万亿美元的高等级债券，而由于关税政策的变化刺激了市场动荡，这些销售的时机选择比往年更加困难。【原文：Companies are expected to sell nearly another $1 trillion of high-grade bonds in the US this year, and timing those sales is harder than it’s been in years, as tariff policy changes spur market turmoil.】

item.title: 阿达尼退出后，肯尼亚为价值 2.45 亿美元的输电线路招标
item.description: 肯尼亚在取消与印度阿达尼集团（Adani Group）的交易数月后，正在寻求私人投资者开发高压输电线路。【原文：Kenya is seeking private investors to develop high-voltage transmission lines months after it canceled a deal with India’s Adani Group.】

item.title: 阿波罗的斯洛克说，通过经济衰退抑制利率 "不是一个好主意
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：A US recession would widen the US budget deficit, eclipsing the savings from lower interest rates and borrowing costs, according to Apollo Global Management Inc.’s chief economist.】

item.title: AMD 因美国对人工智能芯片的出口管制而损失 8 亿美元
item.description: 美国先进微器件公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. said it expects to take a charge of as much as $800 million after the Trump administration put new restrictions on semiconductor exports to China.】

item.title: 黄金持续上涨推动南非股市创下历史新高
item.description: 由于金价飙升提振了南非贵金属矿业公司的股价，南非基准股指创下收盘纪录。【原文：South Africa’s benchmark stock index headed for a record close as the surging gold price boosted shares of the country’s precious-metals miners.】

item.title: 美国工厂产出在关税前小幅增长
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布征收更大规模关税之前的一个月，美国工厂产出在 3 月份小幅增长，这至少对制造商构成了短期风险。【原文：US factory output rose at a modest pace in March, a month ahead of President Donald Trump’s announcement of more sweeping tariffs that pose at least a short-term risk for manufacturers.】

item.title: 维斯塔公司以 15 亿美元收购马来西亚国家石油公司持有的阿根廷石油公司股份
item.description: Vista Energy 是阿根廷新兴的瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩盆地的第二大原油生产商，该公司收购了 Petronas 在当地一个油田的 50% 股份。【原文：Vista Energy, the No. 2 crude producer in Argentina’s burgeoning Vaca Muerta shale basin, has acquired Petronas’ 50% stake in an oil field there.】

item.title: 加拿大汽车城提前尝到特朗普贸易战的甜头
item.description:
随着安大略省温莎市的大型 Stellantis 工厂暂时关闭，该市笼罩在一片忧虑之中。【原文：

Worry grips Windsor, Ontario, as the city’s massive Stellantis plant temporarily shuts its doors.

】

item.title: 世界贸易组织下调全球贸易展望，原因是特朗普关税引发混乱
item.description: 世界贸易组织下调了今年的商品贸易预测，因为美国关税飙升和更广泛的不确定性对国际商业造成了冲击。【原文：The World Trade Organization slashed its forecast for merchandise trade this year as soaring US tariffs and broader uncertainty hammer international commerce.】

item.title: 关税动荡缓解，欧洲促进汽油流向美洲
item.description: 欧洲运往美洲（主要是美国）的汽油本月大幅增加，这与季节性趋势一致，而且在美国关税带来的最初混乱之后，市场情绪略有改善。【原文：European gasoline shipments to the Americas, mainly the US, jumped this month, consistent with seasonal trend and a moderate improvement in market sentiment after the initial chaos brought about by US tariffs.】

item.title: 据说博彩游戏开发商 Hacksaw 正考虑在斯德哥尔摩上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在线博彩游戏开发商和发行商 Hacksaw 正在考虑在未来几个月内在斯德哥尔摩进行首次公开募股。【原文：Hacksaw, a developer and distributor of online betting games, is considering an initial public offering in Stockholm in the coming months, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Ocado 技术销售主管辞职，蒂姆-斯坦纳接任
item.description: 蒂姆-斯坦纳（Tim Steiner）将暂时负责奥卡多集团（Ocado Group Plc）在全球范围内推广其机器人杂货配送技术的许可工作，这一出人意料的举动导致该公司管理层进一步变动。【原文：Tim Steiner is taking temporary charge of Ocado Group Plc’s push to license its robotic grocery delivery technology worldwide, in a surprise move ushering in further management changes at the company.】

item.title: Lyft 以 1.97 亿美元收购 Freenow，进军欧洲市场
item.description: Lyft 公司同意以约 1.75 亿欧元（1.97 亿美元）的价格收购欧洲打车应用 Freenow，这标志着该公司首次在美国和加拿大以外的地区进行全球扩张。【原文：Lyft Inc. agreed to buy the European taxi-hailing app Freenow for about €175 million ($197 million), marking its first global expansion beyond the US and Canada.】

item.title: 据说合作伙伴集团正在权衡收购意大利 Telepass 股份的方案
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Partners Group 正在为其持有的 Telepass SpA 公司 49% 的股份寻找新的选择，这有可能重塑意大利贝纳通家族控制的收费公路支付企业的所有权。【原文：Private equity firm Partners Group is exploring options for its 49% stake in Telepass SpA, people familiar with the matter said, potentially reshaping the ownership of the toll-road payment business controlled by Italy’s Benetton family.】

item.title: 美国零售销售因购车热潮而创下两年来最大增幅
item.description: 美国 3 月份的零售额因汽车购买量激增而大幅增长，这表明消费者正争先恐后地抢在惩罚性汽车关税之前购买汽车。【原文：US retail sales rose substantially in March on a jump in car purchases, suggesting consumers were scrambling to get ahead of punitive auto tariffs.】

item.title: 伊拉克迫于实现欧佩克+目标的压力计划削减石油出口
item.description: 据一位知情官员透露，伊拉克计划在本月削减石油出口，因为它面临着越来越大的压力，必须遵守欧佩克+的产量目标。【原文：Iraq plans to cut oil exports this month as it faces growing pressure to adhere to its OPEC+ production target, according to an official with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 南非 Clicks 公司无视经济低迷实现盈利增长
item.description: 南非保健品零售商Clicks Group Ltd.预计，尽管增值税上调、经济低迷和全球不确定性制约了贸易环境，其全年盈利仍将增长16%。【原文：South African health-care retailer Clicks Group Ltd. projects growth of as much as 16% in its full-year earnings even as an increase in value-added tax, a sluggish economy and global uncertainty constrain the trading environment.】

item.title: 顶级预测机构警告房市大幅上涨的日子已经结束
item.description:
关税的不确定性和消费者信心的下降有可能给房地产市场带来比一些专家最初预期更大的压力。【原文：

Tariff uncertainty and dwindling consumer confidence threatens to pressure the housing market even more than some experts initially expected. 

】

item.title: 埃尔多安对手被捕，土耳其利率之路陷入困境
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安的最大竞争对手被捕，全球贸易战一触即发，市场动荡不安，土耳其将于周四做出棘手的利率决定。【原文：Turkey is set for a tricky interest-rate decision on Thursday, due to market turmoil following the arrest of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s biggest rival and the onset of a global trade war.】

item.title: 米莱伊浮动阿根廷比索有引发通货膨胀的风险
item.description: 每天早上，卡洛斯-阿邦斯和他的六名员工都会走访布宜诺斯艾利斯的五金店，运送电气用品，并鼓励客户向他的家族企业下新订单。但这个星期一对他们来说有所不同。【原文：Every morning, Carlos Abons and his six employees visit hardware stores around Buenos Aires, delivering electrical supplies and encouraging customers to place new orders with his family-run business. But this Monday was different for them.】

item.title: 监察机构称，泰国安全部门对活动人士进行了骚扰
item.description: 网络安全研究人员说，泰国安全部门正在 Facebook 和 X 上对民主活动人士进行骚扰，怂恿他们的追随者在恐吓活动中骚扰他们。【原文：Thai security services are doxxing pro-democracy activists on Facebook and X, urging their followers to harass them in a campaign of intimidation, cybersecurity researchers said.】

item.title: 据说桑坦德资产管理公司考虑在葡萄牙裁员
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）正在考虑削减葡萄牙资产管理部门的工作岗位，以降低成本。【原文：Banco Santander SA is weighing job cuts in its Portuguese asset management unit as it seeks to cut costs.】

item.title: 亚洲购买更多美国天然气的承诺可能会落空
item.description:
进口商正在讨好唐纳德-特朗普总统，但加强采购的誓言并不一定会转化为具体的交易。【原文：

Importers are courting President Donald Trump, but vows to step up purchases won’t necessarily turn into concrete deals.

】

item.title: 印度央行再次放弃关键现金工具，引发政策转变热潮
item.description: 印度中央银行再次暂停了其主要的现金管理业务，引发了人们对该机构可能改变处理银行流动性方式的猜测。【原文：India’s central bank has again held back its primary cash management operation, stoking speculation about a possible shift in how the authority handles bank liquidity.】

item.title: 伦敦不再是英国房租上涨最快的城市
item.description: 官方数据显示，伦敦房租通胀率已降至两年前的水平，这表明英国首都的生活成本压力开始缓解。【原文：London rent inflation cooled to levels last seen two years ago, according to official data, in signs that cost-of-living pressures in the UK capital are starting to ease.】

item.title: 欧洲可转换债券成为关税风暴中的避风港
item.description: 可转换债券是欧洲资本市场近乎沉寂的一角，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统推动重塑美国贸易政策所引发的动荡之后，它正成为一种避难所。【原文：Convertible bonds — a near-dormant corner of Europe’s capital markets — are emerging as a refuge in the wake of the upheaval sparked by President Donald Trump’s push to remake US trade policy.】
